original_text: Aaron brought the goat. This was the people's sacrifice to God. Aaron killed it and he burnt it on the altar. It was an offering to atone for the people's sin. He offered this sacrifice in the same way as the first sacrifice for sin.
korean_text: 그가 또 백성의 예물을 드리되 곧 백성을 위한 속죄제의 염소를 가져다가 잡아 전과 같이 죄를 위하여 드리고

sentences.original_text: This was the people's sacrifice to God.
and he burnt it on the altar.
It was an offering to atone for the people's sin.
sentences.korean_translation: 그것은 백성의 죄를 속하기 위한 제물이었습니다.

sentences.original_text: He offered this sacrifice in the same way
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 이 제물을 동일한 방법으로 드렸습니다.

sentences.original_text: as the first sacrifice for sin.
sentences.korean_translation: 첫 번째 죄를 위한 제물과 같이.
